achievements: Known for his roles in films like *Lethal Weapon*, *The Color Purple*, and *Angels in the Outfield*.
Founder of the Glover Family Foundation.
Grammy Award winner for Best Traditional R&B Performance
Emmy Award winner for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series
Starred in the television series 'Community' and 'Atlanta'
Released critically acclaimed music under the stage name Childish Gambino
Distinguished stage and screen actor with a career spanning over six decades
Notable roles in films like 'For Your Eyes Only', 'Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade' and 'The Empire Strikes Back'
Awarded the Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) for services to drama
